title: Bad fps gittering and drops??
body: i am getting constant drops and gittering after small update today? really bad in team fights and what not. restart game. redownloaded. everything.  other games running smoothly. Mates have had the same problem. Please fix

replies.body:
Hi folks

We're also seeing this and working on it to find the cause.  There isn't an ETA as yet for a fix.

Cheers
Mindstar

Hi folks

We've changed a setting that should hopefully reduce the impact of these drops / glitches, for games that started after 16:40 AEST (Sydney Time)

Let me know if things improve for you!

Cheers
Mindstar

Still having a few issues here. Mostly fine throughout the game except for a few teamfights where it dropped down to 40 odd.

Nothing else running at the time and have never had issues before this latest hotfix/patch today.
I'm back to normal its nice and smooth again, Thank you.

Still having major issues, fps is fine but ping constantly sits at 130 and tends to drop to 1000-2500 at times.
makes playing the game impossible even in custom games
Yeah same here last night was fine and then today its been bad dropping a lot hope it gets noticed soon. {{item:2056}}
